title: Riot can I have free IP and RP
body: Riot, recently it was my birthday and I would like to ask you for RP so i can buy Yasuo and other champions that i think may be fun. Recently after about 2 weeks I was finally able to save enough IP for Ekko and i think it took a little long to get the IP to do so. I play as often as I can but is still takes me a while since I'm not very good at the game. Overall I just want RP and IP. Please and thank you.

replies.body:
I hope you had a great birthday!  I like your summoner icon to match the occasion.  :D  We don't really give out free IP or RP, so I couldn't help with that.  We do have some events and promotions sometimes if you'd like to bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay updated (I see you recently unlocked Riot Kayle which is great)!  

You can also unlock [Facebook Tristana ](https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/app/208195102528120)for free as well.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=JoyHally,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=N8l3EnWY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T18:17:58.891+0000)
>I would like to ask you for RP so i can buy Yasuo

Nope
